Current time

Source: R/time.R
what_time.Rd

Returns a sentence with the current time

Usage

what_time(city = "Vancouver")

Arguments

city

City either "Vancouver" or "Chemnitz"

Value

A character string

Examples

what_time()
#> [1] "Mmhm! It is 04:45 now!"
